data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Attached is the Corporate Dossier of the Company.

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis, in the format specified in the accounting standards for
the half year ended 31st March, 2021.
